name: Verr Goldet
desc: The owner of Wangshu Inn. She claims to be from Mondstadt and moved to Liyue with her husband Huai'an to manage the inn.

customize.text:
<color=#ffd780>Stage Introduction</color>
Wangshu Inn has means of "turning down" the request of less-than-courteous guests to stay. One can practically deduce the scene when said rude guests are expelled from the blithe smile on Verr Goldet's face...
<color=#ccbfad>Special Rule: When your opponent triggers an Elemental Reaction, all opposing characters will be healed for 2 HP.</color>
<color=#ffffffd9>Opposing Lineup</color>

customize.name: Mirror Maiden
customize.desc:
"Snezhnayan Maiden" Mirror Enovy

All secrets shall be concealed within the mirror of glaring brightnessâ€¦

customize.name: Player EXP
customize.desc: Obtained by winning Genius Invokation TCG matches. Every duel you won builds upon the paths to victory, such is the act of earning experience itself. To know how to overcome and subdue the adversary in any situation is the greatest strength that a player can possess.

customize.name: Lucky Coin
customize.desc: Currency verified and used by the Genius Invokation TCG Society. Can be used to purchase various items related to Genius Invokation TCG. It is said that these coins were initially named as such in the hopes that they would bring those carrying them luck. However, perhaps it is those who are sufficiently lucky who are able to possess them...

customize.name: Almond Tofu
customize.desc: A dessert made out of almond. It has a silky-smooth texture with a long-lasting aroma of almond. It's named tofu only because of its tofu-like shape.

customize.name: Mora
customize.desc: Common currency. The one language everybody speaks.

customize.name: Matsutake Meat Rolls
customize.desc: A pan-fried meat dish. Ground meat is put on the Matsutake and gently pan-fried on low heat so the Matsutake can fully take in the aromatic juice of the meat. It's a mouthwatering delicacy in all of its glory.

customize.name: Mora
customize.desc: Common currency. The one language everybody speaks.

customize.name: Jueyun Chili Chicken
customize.desc: Chicken in a dressing, served cold. The way the dish has been prepared captures the succulence of the chicken perfectly. Beneath the glowing gold skin, the meat has a mildly hot flavor.
